Module edu.citadel.cvm

Package edu.citadel.cvm.assembler

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Assembler
    Assembler for the CPRL Virtual Machine.
    Parser
    This class uses recursive descent to perform syntax analysis of the source language.
    Scanner
    Performs lexical analysis for CVM assembly language.
    Token
    Instantiates the generic class AbstractToken for CVM assembly language symbols.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    Symbol
    This class encapsulates the symbols (also known as token types) for the CVM assembly language.
